reqs:
Pre-reqs: MINE 292.
Students from outside the department wanting to take any of the following courses (MINE 292, MINE 331, MINE 333, MINE 590J, MINE 581, MINE 462/566, MINE 438/590P, MINE 434/ 577, MINE 224) are required to complete the following safety requirements before registering in the course http://mining.ubc.ca/safety/safety-requirements/. You will be waitlisted until you have met the requirements.
description: Theory and technology of flotation and ancillary processes.
